title: Saudi Aramco
summary: Saudi Aramco (Arabic: أرامكو السعودية‎ ʾArāmkū s-Saʿūdiyyah), officially the Saudi Arabian Oil Company (formerly Arabian-American Oil Company), is a Saudi Arabian public petroleum and natural gas company based in Dhahran.[6][7] As of 2020, it is one of the largest companies in the world by revenue.[8] Saudi Aramco has both the world's second-largest proven crude oil reserves, at more than 270 billion barrels (43 billion cubic metres),[9] and largest daily oil production of all oil-producing companies.[10][11] It is the single greatest contributor to global carbon emissions of any company in the world since 1965.[12]
